title: Master’s Linguistics Course
text:
This page records the history of my involvement in the course of the Linguistics Master’s Program at the Faculty of Humanities, Udayana University.

2025 - now

Etika dan Metode Penelitian Bahasa (Ethics and Methods in Language Research) (Course coordinator: Prof. Dr. I Wayan Pastika; Members: Gede Primahadi Wijaya Rajeg, Ph.D.; Dr Ni Made Ayu Widiastuti) - I am filling in for the Corpus Linguistics method






This webpage by Gede Primahadi Wijaya Rajeg is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International
 Back to top

title: Co-authored publications
text:
This page records the history of my involvement in co-authored publication(s) with the Linguistics Doctoral Students at the Faculty of Humanities, Udayana University.

2024

Widiastuti, Ni Made Ayu, Ketut Artawa, I Made Rajeg, I Nyoman Udayana & Gede Primahadi Wijaya Rajeg. 2024. Selecting representative data samples from corpus collection with specific target domains. The International Journal of Social Sciences World (TIJOSSW) 6(1). 225–237. (Paper) - the first, second, third and last authors are members of the CompLexico research group

title: Doctoral Linguistics Course
text:
This page records my involvement in the course of the Linguistics Doctoral Program at the Faculty of Humanities, Udayana University.

2020 - now

Convener and course designer for Linguistik Korpus (Corpus Linguistics) - taught every Odd semester

title: Welcome
text:
This webpage1 records the history of my involvement with students’ research projects at Udayana University at different degree levels, starting from the academic year 2019/2020.

title: Doctoral Examination
text:

title: Doctoral Examination
text:
2021/2022 (Odd Semester)

Ni Putu Ayu Pujiani (Pre-proposal title: Sinonimi Verba Bahasa Inggris [Verbal Synonyms in English])

title: Doctoral Examination
text:
2024/2025 (Odd Semester)

Ni Putu Ayu Pujiani (Thesis title: Verba ‘Perintah’ Bahasa Inggris [‘Command’ verbs in English]) - news
Putu Weddha Savitri (Thesis title: Ajektiva Bahasa Prancis Bermakna ‘luar biasa’: Analisis Semantik Berbasis Korpus [French Adjectives meaning ‘Extraordinary’: A corpus-based semantic analysis]) - member of the CompLexico research group; news
